Provide a clear and concise description of the changes introduced in this PR.  
Examples:
- "Implemented SignIn screen UI with SwiftUI"
- "Added authentication flow using MVVM + Clean Architecture"
- "Refactored Core/Network layer using URLSession + async/await"
- "Migrated Feature/Auth to feature-based folder structure"

Closes # (issue number)

## Type of Change
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] Breaking change (existing functionality no longer works as expected)
- [ ] Refactor (code improvement without changing behavior)
- [ ] Architecture change (MVVM, Clean Architecture, DI, folder structure, etc.)
- [ ] UI/UX update (SwiftUI layout, navigation flow, components, theming)
- [ ] Documentation update (README, comments, architecture notes, etc.)
- [ ] Other (please describe):

## Checklist
- [ ] My branch is up to date with `origin/develop`
- [ ] The project builds successfully (Xcode build succeeds with ⌘B)
- [ ] All Swift unit tests pass locally (if applicable) using `swift test` or Xcode Test (⌘U)
- [ ] No SwiftLint or build warnings introduced (if SwiftLint is enabled)
- [ ] Commit messages follow the **Conventional Commits** standard
- [ ] UI changes have been manually tested on simulator/device
- [ ] No sensitive data (keys, tokens, credentials) are committed
- [ ] Folder structure respects the feature-based architecture (Feature/Module → Data/Domain/Presentation)
- [ ] At least one teammate has reviewed this PR
